p: The experiments were performed on FL83B mouse hepatocytes (ATCC, Rockville, MD, USA) incubated in F12K medium containing 10% fetal bovine serum (Invitrogen Corporation, Camarillo, CA, USA) in 10 cm Petri dishes at 37°C and 5% CO 2. The experiments were conducted on cells that were 80–90% confluent.
